thread.title: Watch: Rangoon trailer 2 is immensely satisfying, visually and thematically
thread.title_full: Watch: Rangoon trailer 2 is immensely satisfying, visually and thematically

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE.
title: Watch: Rangoon trailer 2 is immensely satisfying, visually and thematically
text:
video. Mumbai: Vishal Bhardwaj is back and he seems to be in no mood to compromise on his work, especially since 'Rangoon' has been his pet project for the longest time.
The film, which stars Shahid Kapoor, Kangana Ranaut and Saif Ali Khan in the lead roles, is a poignant love triangle, a la Casablanca, set to the backdrop of the second world war.
Saif, whose antagonistic side in the film has been amply revealed by now, looks terrifically back in form.
Kangana seems to be at home, playing the smug superstar actress, torn between two strapping men vying for her.
Shahid, who's playing an armyman for the very first time, comes across as the male lead, with Saif's negative shades being made evident.
The film, which has a very acclaimed score by Vishal himself, is set to hit the theatres on February 24.
Watch the trailer here:
